â€‹From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia

Jack Davenport (born 1 March 1973) is an English actor, best known for his roles in the television series This Life, Coupling and the Pirates of the Caribbean series of films. He has also appeared in many other Hollywood films such as The Talented Mr. Ripley. More recently, Davenport was part of the ensemble cast of characters in the drama series FlashForward.
